name: Relax
description:
READ IT ALL BECAUSE uhh... THERE ARE SUPRISES THROUGHOUT ALL OF THE POST NO SKIPPING (hope fall for it)...

Controls: Space to FLY HIGH!! ESC button to pause and unpause.

Yo watsup guys this is my first game EVER!!! Funny story this game was influenced by me raging on csgo and i just thought hmm why don't i create a game were i can just relax and be liberated from all the head shots and BS kills so i made this simple relaxing endless runner ik (another endless runner what a fag), but check it out anyway :p. Hope you guys like it feel free to leave feed back even if it is just to call it "WORST PIECE S*** I EVER PLAYED" that also helps so ya have fun or not... lol.

* Minimalist graphics

* RIDE A JETPACK!!!

* Collect yummy coins

* Select diffrent Scenery

* Relaxing Music

* Might contain bugs....

* Did i Mention..RIDE A JETPACK!!

@BluuToast follow me and get free toast :cool:
